Title: Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 - Moves List
Description: *** UMK3 Special Edition(SNES) FAQ 2.06 (c)1996-2004 By Charles Grey (iceout0002@aol.com) Last Update 09/08/2004

Verions.9/8/04: Various move corrections, easier LKang friendship.
Verions.1/1/04: Reformatted the FAQ, a few move fixes.

Stages: Scorpion's Lair(can uppercut to Kahn's Kave)
Notes: *Some audio/graphic data removed to save memory.
*Shang cannot morph into Rain or Noob.
Changes: *Ermac, Mileena, and Classic Sub-Zero no longer need "Ultimate Kombat Kodes".
*Older stages except PIT III and Roof removed.
*"Winner Fight Smoke" code you still fight robot Smoke.
*Shao Kahn's Treasures only in 8-man tournament and reduced from 12 to 10
squares and many of those are duplicates.
*Ermac's head punch fatality has been changed.
*Human Smoke and Classic Sub appear in Randper mode.
*Human Smoke appears normally in demo mode.

Controls.Info: You can reconfigure these with "OPTIONS". You can also set damage handicaps for 2-player games and disable blood/fatalities if you wish.

Basic Attacks.Description: jump punch, can link into combo
vertical kick, can link into combo
low block(must be used for sweeps)

Tournament.Directions: Each side selects 2 fighters. When one loses, the second jumps in like an endurance round.

Each side selects 4 fighters. There are a total of 7 one-round fights. Beware, you may have to use one of your opponent's selections later in the battle. Winner selects prize from Shao Kahn's Treasures.
Hold L+R, and start on left controller. First opponent to defeat all 8 of his/her opponent's fighters wins.

Notes: When you succeed in draining your opponents' lifebar, it will say "FINISH HIM/HER" and you will have about 5 seconds to input a finishing kode. (If some involve tapping up, hold BL to keep from jumping!)
Don't do these too fast or else they won't work.

Codes.Directions: Do these at the right distance.
Must not use BL on winning round or they will not work. Do Reptile's and Scorpion's up close.
Must not use BL on winning round. Can be done anywhere.
Do up close on either PIT III or Lair stages
On round 3 only! (RN) for 3 seconds,D,D,and release. Brings them back to life. Originally used for Animalities.
Stand close and tap out the lengthy button sequence. Complete it and they churn out about 15 more hits ending with an exploding uppercut!

Characters.Name: Rain
Notes: Rain can't use bubble or powerkick after 3 hits.
Lightning cannot be used in middle of combo.
In this version Rain has no friendship,fatalities.

Characters.Name: Reptile

Code.Notes: Opponent must be above head before uppercut.

Notes: Reptile can't use the orb after 4 hits.

Combos.Notes: Must be relatively close to corner, but not too close or else you will get pushed out.

Characters.Name: Jade

Notes: Make sure boomerang misses first pass!
Jade can't use Jade Kick after 2 hits.

Characters.Name: NoobSaibot

Code.Notes: First blast has to be done right away.

Combos.Notes: Image throw has to be into a corner.

Special Combos.Code: Slam, image throw, blast, jump HP,HP,HP,LP,HK, jumpkick, slam, image throw, run in,uppercut

Special Combos.Notes: All of these combos start with a teleport slam in the corner...

notes: Noob can't use katatonic blast after 4 hits.
Noob has no fatalities or friendship in this version.

Combos.Notes: Must be done in a corner.
Can add a sweep if near a corner for 41%.

Friendship.Description: Looks in mirror and breaks it

Characters.Name: Classic Sub-Zero

Combos.Notes: After freeze, push from 3/4 screen to corner.

notes: Sub can't use Ice or pool after 2 hits.
He has no 2nd fatality or friendship on this version.

Characters.Name: Sub-Zero
notes: Sub can't use ice or image after 2 hits.

Characters.Name: Sektor
notes: Sektor can't use teleport punch after 2 hits.

Characters.Name: Kitana
Notes: Elevate can't be used in combo.

Characters.Name: Ermac
notes: Ermac can't Slam or teleport after 5 hits.
He has no friendship in this version.

Characters.Name: Scorpion
notes: Scorpion can't teleport after 2 hits

Characters.Name: Cyrax
notes: Cyrax can't use net after 3 hits.

Characters.Name: Kabal

Code.Notes: Can add run,HK if close to corner for 44%.

notes: Kabal can't use time stop after 2 hits.

Characters.Name: Smoke(robot)
notes: Smoke can't use teleport punch after 2 hits.

MORPHS.Code: B to U to F to D

Characters.Name: Smoke(human)
Characters.Code: Select robot smoke, hold B+HP+HK+RN+BL until the round begins Human Smoke appears in a puff. Will not work after the restart trick!
notes: Smoke can't teleport or spear after 5 hits.
Smoke has no 2nd fatality or friendship in this version.
For 2-player games only.
Left player controls slots #1,#2,#3(HP,LP,LK)
Right player controls slots #4,#5,#6(HP,LP,LK)
Tap button to go up 1 symbol, hold up to go down 1 symbol(can go from 0 to 9 this way)
BE QUICK YOU ONLY HAVE SIX SECONDS TO DO THESE!
instructions: At "VS" screen, each player's LP,BL,and LK buttons set the boxes at the bottom center of the screen.
Symbols will be referred to as numbers instead here.

notes: Will glitch out often, especially with characters with incomplete finishers.

Notes: Will cease to work if the Scorpion/Ermac/Human Smoke air teleport move is used.
Shao says "excellent" or "outstanding" after each throw.

Codes.Description: Fight at the Portal(933-933 DOES NOT WORK)

Left Controller.Directions: B/F on controller 1 to select stages.
Left,Down,Y,Y to access sound test. "Come here!"(#141)

Old and useless: Hold X+Y until options screen appears
It's the old Smoke code from the original MK3! But who needs it now?

Special Codes.Notes: A note about bosses: They can only be used in a 2-player game, and then only by one person.
Special Codes.Restart trick: In a 1-player game, tap start on the other controller and then hold start on yours. Select "MORTAL KOMBAT" and you can restart the fight with a new character without using continues!

Shao Kahn's Treasures(after 8-man tourne.Description: Shows fatalities and friendships for all except Rain,Noob,Classic Sub,and Human Smoke,and babalities for all.

Shao Kahn's Treasures(after 8-man tourne.Code: Fight 100 consecutive 2-player battles. Believe me, it's not that good.

Glitches.Directions: Turn the game on and hold L+R on the right controller. An unintelligable message will appear in the upper center of the copyright screen. Huh? It says "SEPT 6 11:03 AM"
Occasionally, when next to your opponent, they will do a kick instead of a combo starter knee.
When using 1-button fatalities with Rain,Ermac,or Sub-Zero, use LK and they walk to about sweeping distance and freeze and the game says"FRIENDSHIP". Occasionally occurs during demo mode as well!
Doing his HP,HP,B+LP combo causes all following moves to do greatly reduced damage!
Doing Nightwolf's axe or Kitana's fans sometimes causes the game to slow down or scroll weirdly.
Once I did the PowerKick and the game froze.

During one-button fatalities or occasionally in demo mode,Rain, Noob, or Human Smoke will walk to a certain distance and just do their winning pose. I think this is what happens when you attempt a fatality that isn't really there.

Use old tournament mode and random select, if you get an "E" it thinks it's still Sheeva! You will have an almost completely invisible image. The "ghost" cannot do Sheeva's special moves, but can still do her kombos, at least the HP,HP,LP,F+HP one! Try throwing with her and watch the screen go up and down!
When playing on this tower, the difficulty level seems to be high on the second CPU opponent.

Have your brightness turned up on your TV/monitor when doing Classic Sub's head pull fatality. While the screen blacks out, a very faint image of Sub-Zero doing his winning pose, your opponent in his "scared" pose and the word "FATALITY" can be seen!

Stryker and Kano can't start their combos beginning with a HP from a jump punch on either of the female ninjas, the standing HP hit will miss! Cyrax also has this problem and the first punch will miss when he nets N.Wolf
Drain your the last of your opponents' energy with a jump punch and then hit HP,HP as if starting a combo. Mileena will hold fans for a split second while doing her winning pose!
Play sounds #109 and #110 right after each other very very quick! Nuff said.

When your opponent has 10% or less life in the final round, finish them off with this combo:Slam,LP,blast. Then do the babality(F,F,F,LP). The baby will flash and then be discolored! You can also do another blast and Noob himself will flash in his winning pose!

At the end of the match, stand back a full screen and throw a slow orb. Then quickly do his babality (F,F,B,D,LK) before the orb hits. They will be bounced up as they are turned into a baby and stay suspended in air!
Do a MERCY with CYRAX right after launching a far bomb and see what happens!
Doing Kahn's verbal taunt at certain times, he will not speak.
Enter 1 button brutalities with fatalities OFF. And finish with HP and your character does just half of his/her brutality and then stops!

Directions.notes: Have 1 button fatalities turned on, end of round 2 only, and have opponent win first match.

Glitches.Directions: Hit LK for Nightwolf's friendship, then have the other player perform his/her brutality.
Have Scorpion or Reptile do their 1 button friendship and do your brutality. You do it but THEY get credit for it!
Hit Scorpion or Reptile before the skull or lizard head comes out. Both will do their victory poses!
If you do Kung Lao's brutality in the corner, he will stop right after the screen goes black.
Do his Image Throw up close then LP for a double throw.
